name: Within The Forest
description:
After getting stuck in Blackwood Forest, you try to find a way to get back home and out of this dangerous forest. However, you are not alone. Something is in Blackwood Forest with you and its intentions with you are not pleasant. Find all the necessary items needed to fix your car, before it's too late.

Please tell me about any bugs you find in the game in the comments below so I can make the game a more enjoyable experience.

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move, hold SHIFT to run, space to jump, F for flashlight, C to crouch, M for map, and ESCAPE for pause menu.
